actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable income tax credit for the recycling of hazardous wastes.
short_title: Hazardous Waste Recycling Tax Credit Act of 2001

summary.text: Hazardous Waste Recycling Tax Credit Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax credit of two cents per pound for the recycling of hazardous wastes.

titles.title: Hazardous Waste Recycling Tax Credit Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable income tax credit for the recycling of hazardous wastes.
